response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, we propose a special offer for you to acquire this product at a price of $1,100,000. We understand its worth to you might be higher, but we hope this offer allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of doing business with you.", "product_price": 1100000}
